change1: - Added: An entire project can now be analyzed via the 'Analyze' tab.
change3: - Changed: Redefined the default window size for the GUI so that it is large enough for asll of the fields to show appropriately.
change5: - Fixed: Analysis API key is showing 'Set' when, in fact, it is unset.
change6: - Fixed: Realigned the GUI fields for getting the file from the Android device.
change7: - Fixed: Incorrectly defining Android device attributes when selecting "Get XML from Android Device" and then cancelling this option in the GUI.
change8: - Fixed: If displaying the outline and processing only a single Profile, then the outline is showing all Projects rather than just the Project this Profile is a part of.
change9: - Fixed: In certain circumstances, if doing a single Profile or Task, the containing Project/Profile would also be saved in the settings.
